testcase.name: SOAP API testing

failure.message: karate07.feature:13 - path: , actual: '<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><soap:Body><CelsiusToFahrenheitResponse xmlns="https://www.w3schools.com/xml/"><CelsiusToFahrenheitResult>Error</CelsiusToFahrenheitResult></CelsiusToFahrenheitResponse></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>', expected: '122', reason: not a sub-string
